snippet.title: LGR - Hover! - PC Game Review
snippet.description:
Jump in your hovercraft/bumper car hybrid and collect all the flags before the opposing drones do! Hover, the free pack-in game for Windows 95, lets you do this and... not much else.

Download Hover! from Microsoft's public FTP
ftp://ftp.microsoft.com/deskapps/games/public/AAS/Hover.EXE

Or try this
https://docs.google.com/open?id=0B7-cJK68JK-3Z0c5c3pCa0lzS2c

And you can play the 2013 version in your browser!
http://hover.ie/
